attributes.action: Stop making policy based on knee jerk reactions to front page newspaper headlines
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: It is the Government who should be creating policy, not the editors of newspapers. Stop all your knee jerk reactions to base human emotion. For once, just give some thought to the laws you pass. This headless chicken mode must stop.

reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
